website_summaries.verdict: This pedal car is a little less expensive than other models, but is a solid buy that can last as your child grows.
pros: Has a bucket seat that can adjust for the height of the child
cons: While the brake works, it is essentially just a metal bar that pushes against the wheel
Rubber tires do a good job on several types of surfaces including grass or dirt

customer_reviews.title: WINNER
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I needed. Fairly easy to put together with help. If I had been by myself, it would have been a struggle. My 6 year old LOVES it. Good quality, worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one of each (green and pink) Hauk Pedal Go Karts for our grandkids when they come to visit. They absolutely love these things! They are well built and were super easy to assemble. Our 4 year old granddaughter was able to peddle it on the closest setting and a 6 year old grandson who is pretty big was able to peddle it comfortably on the farthest setting. You can’t go wrong with these! The price is unbelievable for such a quality product. The kids, grandkids and neighbor kids will love them! I think the adults are secretly jealous! You won’t be sorry with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Best pedal cart for under $100!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves it! I have had no problems with the steering wheel like the other reviewers had. Everything is secure, but not entirely even. The wheels are not as "snug" as I would like them to be, but I had to remind myself that this is for a small child and not for a teenager or adult. I look at items critically since I am an engineer by trade. I do like that the wheels are surrounded in rubber and not entirely hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Tank

customer_reviews.title: A hit with three and five year-old grandsons
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as Christmas gifts for my 3 and 5 year old grandsons. The boys have been pretty rough with them but they are pretty durable. They ride them almost every day and have never gotten tired of them. We take them to the park and they ride on the paved trail while I walk. Works out great!
customer_reviews.author: Cyd1959

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough good things about the Hauck Go-Kart
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about the Hauck Go-Kart! Just when you think "they don't make 'em like that anymore" you find out that, yes, in this case they do. Solid metal construction, simple assembly. Tires even have rubber treads. Four year old grandson loves it. Likes to get going fast then hit the brake to skid to a stop. Adjustable seat is a good feature so he will be able to enjoy the kart for a while. He feels "grown up" riding.
customer_reviews.author: bobcat931

customer_reviews.title: This was my sons favorite gift for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: This was my sons favorite gift for Christmas! He is six years old so we have to use the largest setting for his legs. It is so much fun though and I like that he has to pedal. He has a blast racing around and doesn't have to worry about falling off like he would with his bike which he actually doesn't even ride. Definitely buy this!
customer_reviews.author: TXCH

customer_reviews.title: Well made, fair price, great toy!
customer_reviews.text: This car has been the hit of our neighborhood! We have had children from ages 3 years to 7 years riding it successfully. It was easy to assemble and well made. The seat adjusts easily and it turns easily, even for young riders. I'm sure this will last through a few generations. We have purchased other riding toys that are not nearly as popular or durable. I'm getting another one to quell the squabbles over whose turn it is to drive!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Anselmi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and broke already
customer_reviews.text: Do not get . Keeps falling apart from 10 minutes of my son playing on it . Built cheap and a waste of good money . I want a refund
customer_reviews.author: misty

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The box was beat up badly, which bent the frame a bit, but my neice was super excited for it, once my husband put it together, we realized it was smaller then we thought, definitely not for 6 year old. More for 3 to 5. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Great pedal kart!
customer_reviews.text: This kart exceeded my expectations on every level. It is very well made and sturdy, the pedaling is smooth, and the steering is very responsive. Assembly was very easy and only took a few minutes. Every kid that rides this kart loves it. Ages 4 to 8 have been able to use it with no problems. A 12 year old even rode it some to be funny and it held up to his weight. Highly recommend this pedal kart.
customer_reviews.author: Maranatha

customer_reviews.title: Great, but careful in reverse
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! It’s well made and easy to assemble. The only reason I give it four stars is because it’s VERY important to wear a helmet always. My son was pedaling backwards and tried the brake and the whole kart went backwards, the front going up in the air. Thankfully he was wearing a helmet or he would’ve hit his head. Be cautious if trying to use the brake while going in reverse.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Riding Toy for Kids
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our 3 year old's birthday and he has had it about a month. It is awesome. Now that he has the pedaling and steering down, he is speeding around everywhere. It is a great riding toy for the money! I would have expected it to cost a lot more. The only issue that we have had is that his legs are not quite long enough to reach even with the seat on the shortest setting but we put a little pad behind his back and he is all set. I would highly recommend! It was an easy assembly and a fun simply toy to get out any time!
customer_reviews.author: Duke Rose III

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. Too small for my 6 yr old, not enough leg room. Otherwise build well.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the 5-7 age range!
customer_reviews.text: This was a christmas gift and a sure win for a 5 year old boy who has never had a ride on toy. We wanted to get him something before he forever out grew that stage. This works! It doesn't do well on anything other than concrete, so no grass or gravel, etc. (That's a bit of a bummer and why I knocked it down a star.) He drives it in our house on the hard wood most days and enjoys sitting in it just playing. It's a great score when you can get it for less than $100. Seems durable and was easy to assemble. The box came to us all torn up, but luckily everything was there.
customer_reviews.author: Pantherina

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old son. He's around 3'6 and it works really well for him. It was easy to put together. He's been riding a lot since getting it and it hasn't shown a lot of wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: khc1223

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: My sons have only ridden of it a couple times but it seems durable and sturdy. They have a lot of fin on it. However I would suggest if you have more than one child that you look for something that allows the seat to be pushed back and forth with a lever. This one makes you take the kid off, turn it over, unscrew the seat, move the seat where you want it, screw it back together, and set it back up for your child. No kid wants to wait for all that when it’s their turn to ride. If it had a lever that moved the seat back and forth I’d happily have this one a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I order both pink and green "Go Karts" on May 5 and received it May 7. The colors are bright and beautiful, easy to assemble, and it rides good 👍. The quality over all is great and the price as well. My twins are going to be 3yrs in 2 weeks and I'm surprised that they know how to ride it. It's only been 2 days and their pros. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Martha Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves his Go Kart
customer_reviews.text: My grandson (age 7) rode his friend's Go-Kart & loved it -- asked if I would buy it as a birthday present, which I did. He's very excited and has been zooming around on the sidewalks in his neighborhood. It's very sturdy and easy to manoeuvre.
customer_reviews.author: D&M

customer_reviews.title: Weight limit
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the description did not list a weight limit. When we got it the manual said 110 pounds. My grandsons weigh less than that and it kept flipping back on them like it was doing a wheelie. Not safe as they kept flipping and hitting their head. I would not recommend for anyone over maybe 50 pounds. It needs more weight on the front end. I would like to return it if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Troyer

customer_reviews.title: Durable pedal cart
customer_reviews.text: This pedal cart is pretty sturdy and takes all the rough riding my grand daughter gives it. She rides it easily on our gravel driveway, usually going as fast as she can and the pulling the brake up to come to a sliding stop. Yeah, she's not a gentle girl. Very tall for her 6 years and adjustable seat accomadates her. It isn't great on grass unless level and not tall. Some reviews only guessed at what I just stayed, so hope this helps answer some questions.
customer_reviews.author: phampton

customer_reviews.title: Fun and great exercise!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and the kids love them. Got two and they want to ride them after school everyday. SO fun! For my kido with sensory processing disorder this is so much more fun for him then a traditional bike. He loves racing it around our neighborhood. I highly recommend them for a fun exercise outdoor activity.
customer_reviews.author: g5mamma

customer_reviews.title: Rubber coated wheels, hooray!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old son loves this car and pedals around all over our cul-de-sac while employing me into "inspector" to fill it with gas and change the tires (pretend of course). One of only a few that have rubber on the wheels which is something I felt was a must have. Now to be clear the wheels are indeed plastic but have a roughly half inch coating of rubber on the outside. It stands to reason that this will aid to the longevity of this pedal car.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: He can easily pick it up and turn it around if needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our son when he turned 4, the seat is n the middle setting. He LOVES it. He can easily pick it up and turn it around if needed and the overall quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Stapley

customer_reviews.title: The hit of the neighborhood!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is SO awesome. And my goodness -- I'll say I was bracing myself for hours of building, but it was together in under 10 minutes. It's durable, high quality and my kids ages 4-8 all love to ride on it.
customer_reviews.author: finleybelle

customer_reviews.title: My kindergartner loves it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy and quick to assemble. I used a power tool and that helped because it's hard to get the wheel nuts on with just the provided hand tool. Seems like a sturdy car so far. Good rubber wheels don't spin on the pavement. My kid found it easy to pedal. He likes the cool hand break. And of course the steering wheel. Seems like a great price point for a quality go-kart. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rated R Cars

customer_reviews.title: Great Go Kart - limited use for tall
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves this pedal go kart! She has asked to ride it almost every day since opening It. It is stylish, sturdy and good exercise. My only complaint is that the seat does not move back far enough. My daughter is about 50” tall and will probably outgrow this within the next 6 months...
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it 5 stars if it drove on other surfaces better. I love it. It was totally worth the money. My girl loves it, but it only works the road, or very compacted dirt or small compacted gravel ( the last two are slow moving and difficult , but work) . It looks sturdy, and my 4 year old loves it, and it has helped her improve her steering and understanding of breaking and reverse, so cool.
customer_reviews.author: bryan greene

customer_reviews.title: Solid frame but does lean.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old grandson who isn’t riding a bike yet loves it. It was easy to put together and he was able to assist in assembly. It is solid and attractive. Only issue is if an inexperienced rider leans too far one way during turning the go cart will flip on the side. No major catastrophe in regular use at a slower pace but I would recommend downhill action unless you know how to rider. It could be a bad accident, but then again kids are resilient (at least in my deneration).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: This cart is a great value. It is solid, but not too heavy and looks like it could take some abuse without falling apart. It has a slick appearance and my 5 year old granddaughter had no trouble navigating it even though she fell off of the bike we got her despite training wheels all the way down. The green one was less but still looks great. Nice investment.
customer_reviews.author: G Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Fun for 6 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Got for almost 7 yr old girl. So far she likes it. She says the seat is to hard on her back, so she added a pillow to give her comfort. The seat is very narrow. If your kid had a booty, then they might not have enough support under the. When the kids make a turn, be careful they dont tip over. I do not recommend this product for older kids. My 10 yr old is to tall for the product. Overall it was easy to put together. Did come with tools.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Calver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, not very fast
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great car for the price. In comparison to all the other pedal karts out there that look like they are cheap, this one is definitely built sturdy. Didn’t have any issues putting it together since it was pretty straight forward. As I was building it, I could feel the quality. The only downside to the kart is how fast you could go. If only it had 2 speeds on it, that would be great. I would be willing to spend an extra 20-30 bucks if it could go faster without compromising the quality. Still my daughter enjoys it for now. So as long as she doesn’t outgrow it too fast, I’ll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great for flat surfaces
customer_reviews.text: The wheels I wish were bigger and the tires are plastic with a strip of rubber on then not real tires
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect gift for 4 year old!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandaughter that lives in another state. My son video called me while she opened it. She was one THRILLED 4 year old! My son assembled while I was on video and took him no time at all very easy! My grandaughter was racing around their house inside. Easy to pedal, appropriate size with a seat that adjusts. I plan to order another in the lime green color for my other grandchild in July!
customer_reviews.author: creative d.

customer_reviews.title: Great peddle gocart!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson for his 5th birthday. He loves it! Fits him well, too, and will for quite a while. Nice that he can just hop on it and ride instead of waiting for charged batteries on his powered kid’s vehicals. The frame is sturdy and well designed. Only thing I would change is giving it solid rubber tires instead of molded plastic ones but for the price it’s a nice gocart.
customer_reviews.author: LynnH

customer_reviews.title: Fun go-cart
customer_reviews.text: My very active three year old got this for Christmas and loves it. His older brother, age 6, also likes to use it. Some of their friends in the neighborhood, ages 4-10, also use it and enjoy it. It was pretty easy for my husband to put together and seems decently durable.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Defective. DO NOT RECCOMEND
customer_reviews.text: we received the steering wheel stripped. It will not screw on so my little girl can’t even ride it. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: BaileyM

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 4-year-old's birthday. She LOVES it! She learned how to control the brake very quickly. Now she fanciest herself a stunt driver. She hasn't touched her bike since.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: My daughters loves it
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves driving it. There is one issue. When you go to fast, the petals start spinning so fast that the kids lose their footing. So basically you can only go so fast. They have to be careful going down hills. They basically take their feet off the petals and let it spin like crazy
customer_reviews.author: David Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best toys I have purchased in a long time. The price is very reasonable for the quality-outstanding metal construction, easy to assemble and the tires are not like typical cheap plastic ones-they have more gripping power. My 8 year old grandson helped me assemble it for his little cousin and couldn't resist a test drive - with the seat fully extended, he was able to hop on and go-then he wouldn't get off! He loved it. The handbrake really works and allows for cool spins and turns. I would recommend this strongly-and I never write recommendations!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend you buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing car so awesome my boyfriend who is 30 loves to ride it too lol!!! It whips!! Very durable and just all around fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Shapleigh

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this to anyone with a kid that has extra ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson LOVES this go-kart so much! Would recommend this to anyone with a kid that has extra energy to burn (don't they all?) Very well built and meant to last. Easy to assemble and FUN to ride!
customer_reviews.author: S. Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy, cheap plastic wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy. Fits my 4 and 6 year olds. Frame seems solid enough. Wheels seem cheap, like they will break before the year is out. Great when they were inside, but now that weather is nice and riding outdoors, not so good. Not a deal breaker for me, just something to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Go speed racer go!
customer_reviews.text: This is really great for little kids (although my older child likes it as well). My 4 year old prefers this to her bike with training wheels as it feels sturdier and she feels like a cool, big kid. She also loves going fast down a hill and then grabbing the brake.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Get it.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved her gift! The seat is adjustable and easy to slide back and forth for adults, but not easy enough for kids to move at will. Breaking may be a little harder for 3 year olds to understand (right hand break) as back pedaling actually moves the car back. Great purchase, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mamioftwo

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: My son received this go cart as a gift for his 6th birthday. He absolutely LOVES it! He can't wait to get home from school each day so that he can ride it. It is well built and sturdy. The seat moves back and forth so it can grow with him. I would definitely recommend this go cart to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Toni P

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This is really cool. My give-year old grandson rode it to the park and was the envy of all of the kids there...even the older ones. It was easy to attach the wheels etc. and it works great. Just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jomo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We've purchased two of these and owned them for over 5 months. Amazing quality and with moderate use every other day, we havent had any issues and they look new. Suprised by quality. Would definelty recommend. Easy to assemble, daughters had fun helping.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Khan

customer_reviews.title: Great little cart for 4 to 7 year olds
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, vibrant colors, so far so good. My 5 year old bombs about our cul de sac on this and loves it. Seems pretty durable but it’s only been 3 months so far. Has 3 seat positions so you will get life out of it as your child grows. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. B. Ekins

customer_reviews.title: Very Popular toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old for Christmas. Just barely writing a review 6 months later. He is five now and he loves this thing. He learned to ride his bike without training wheels and yet he still prefers riding this. Some of the kids a couple years older also enjoy riding it occasionally. The knob securing the seat did work its way loose but we thankfully found it and put it back together. Would recommend checking the fasteners periodically.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Like the first one so much, bought a second one for the grandkids. They love them, and really hold up good.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis A. Jester

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Seat and pedals fell off and it doesn’t work after only 2 months
customer_reviews.author: sara chorba

customer_reviews.title: Awesome b-day gift!
customer_reviews.text: We brought this as a birthday gift for our grandson, he absolutely loved it! Very easy to assembly without the instructions, took about 20 minutes tops. peddles really smoothly and the breaking mechanism functions well.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great peddle bike
customer_reviews.text: All ages can ride it, need a quick adjustable seat so they can take turns faster!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs j

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter love her gift
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter love her birthday gift. It is so perfect, especially now during COVID-19 and we are not able to go to the park. She's four and learned to use it almost immediately. The only thing I would say is that the steering while part was difficult to put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great 5 yo. Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter for her 5th birthday and she has rode the dog out of it!! She goes a million miles an hour every day, all day and it's held up good. She's also a really tall 5 year old and she still has room to scoot the seat back when she grows. She was so excited to get this for her birthday ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Erica Reeves

customer_reviews.title: So Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5yr old loves her go-kart! It will drive on gravel but isn't heave enough to get through thick gravel. Easy to drive, fun, and brake is easy also. A very fun alternative until they can ride a bike!
customer_reviews.author: Kraz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5yr old daughter when her battery operated Jeep quilt working. She absolutely loves this pedal go kart, as well as my nieces when they come to play. I’ve had kids from ages 4-10 ride on this and some of them quite rough at times. We’ve had it for about 3 months now, and after nearly constant use and being store outside on our partially covered porch nothing has broken and is still in like new condition. This was quick and simple to put together. I Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazei_ng

customer_reviews.title: Not very big!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large grandson he is turning 6 and is probably the size of an 8 yr old. This bike is NOT for a larger child. There was no weight limit, but the seat in the furthest position back is still too close to the pedals. Of coarse I was extremely disappointed👎
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Steering wheel broke completely off after a few weeks of riding and cannot find a replacement steering wheel anywher
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s really great and our son just loves it. It should have come with rubber wheel covers to ride inside houses as it scratches hardwood floors after it rides outside probably bcoz sand gets caught in the tires.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Grandson gives it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little smaller than I thought. I’d say max age for this size pedal car is 6 years old. Quality construction though I was surprised the wheels were plastic and not rubber. Our 6 year old loves it and gives it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: JB Rhode Island

customer_reviews.title: Built like a brick outhouse!!
customer_reviews.text: I just finished putting this go cart together. It is the second go art I have put together this week. The first one was $5 cheaper, and was half as solid as this one. I can't wait to see the grandson's face.
customer_reviews.author: F.Furibondo

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: Was a present for her 5th birthday and she loves it! She has difficulty on a bike with training wheels as they wobble, however this thing is sturdy and she's quite good steering! Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good, rugged
customer_reviews.text: Good, rugged, and works for our 4-5 year old. One flax, the steering wheel is turned a bit when the wheels are straight. This is a design flaw, but kids quickly orient to it and it makes no difference. Otherwise great toy, and excellent price/value compared to others. Would recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Art Gasch

customer_reviews.title: Terrific go cart
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and my 3 year old loves it. Can easily reach pedals and maneuver the staring. Love that it is not electric and he can really zip around in it
customer_reviews.author: Katie o

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cart bike, I would replace the cheap plastic twist nuts on the button of the seat with some nylon nuts because the ones included like the fall off. I do wish they made more adjustment for the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons LOVE this Pedal car. My 6 yr old and my 3 year old both were thrilled! The car has a hand brake and is very sturdy! I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit with my 5 year old!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old got this for his birthday and went instantly nuts. It was super easy to put together and I did it myself with no issues. It rides great and its perfect sizing even my 8 year old can jump on and drive it. Great product and a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Put two of these together in under an hour. The boys love them and have definitely challenged the durability. They seem to be impossible to tip and are solid.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: This was quite a hit with the grandkids, who are 5 and 7. It goes fast, is quite durable, and I feel it is well made. Glad we bought it. Just wish I'd fit; looks like so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: MarLin

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and easy to maneuver!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and perfect for my 6 year old with room to grow. We live in a cul de sac at the bottom of a hill so this is so much better for her than a bike. She loves this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Captain112411

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my granddaughter. She loves it! I didn’t put it together but haven’t heard anything in regard to difficulty. Hasn’t been able to use it much due to the weather but will be as soon as it warms up.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Fotorny

customer_reviews.title: The bolt that holds the wheel in place fell off ...
customer_reviews.text: The bolt that holds the wheel in place fell off & now the screw for it is missing. I have no idea how to find a replacement...
customer_reviews.author: Amber D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my five year old grandson for his birthday and he absolutely loves it, him and his brother fight over who gets to ride it!! Perfect 👍
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jones Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this go kart we bought it for his 6th birthday , you’re able to ride it on grass , dirt , gravel , and concrete ... highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: Well packed. Easy to assemble with necessary tools except Phillips screwdriver. Adjustable seat for extended use. Looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Stine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: My five year old loves this!!! Best purchase choice I made. He broke his big wheel and this by far is worth the price and quality is great. Easy to put together. Rubber tires that actually grip to the ground, grass or concrete.
customer_reviews.author: DanyB

customer_reviews.title: A little bit smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Might be a little bit slow my daughter is 7 and it's too small for her so take that in consideration is thinking of buying it
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Colliver

customer_reviews.title: What was expected
customer_reviews.text: I don't exactly know how stury yet.But my four year old and five year old grandsons,seem to put them through their paces.They live them.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Tavano

customer_reviews.title: How to thrill a 5 year old birthday boy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandson's 5th birthday and we couldn't have chosen a better gift! It's well made, sturdy, and has good handling (turning radius is a bit large, but we live in a large cul-de-sac!). He callls it his go-cart, and could spend hours riding and playing with it. Excellent gift.
customer_reviews.author: J. Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, sturdy design, bigger than we thought.
customer_reviews.text: The design is very sturdy, but the tires don't have the best tread. It's also longer than you would think - so if your kid can't reach the pedals on a tricycle they definitely won't be able to fit this.
customer_reviews.author: dasackis

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy and well designed
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old and his friend put most of this together and we tightened up the bolts. It is very sturdy and well designed. I use it in my daycare. My 2 year olds cannot quite reach the pedals but my 3 year old can. It will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Pam R.

customer_reviews.title: Everybody Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Grandson and I think the whole neighborhood to!!!! So happy I got him this well made and handles well
customer_reviews.author: Kim Suchy

customer_reviews.title: Favorite awesome ride!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! My grandson loves this Hauck pedal go cart. He is tall for his age; just turned five. He rides it constantly. When he received it on his birthday, there was no room to grow. Is this item available in a larger model? I fear he will outgrow it before he tires of it! I’d buy another, if bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Mary in IL

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 3year old grandson, he loved it! His face light up in a huge smile! That’s all I have to say
customer_reviews.author: Goose55

customer_reviews.title: It would be a 5 but it looks bigger than ...
customer_reviews.text: It would be a 5 but it looks bigger than it is..my son just turned 6 and he is already on the last notch to adjust the seat...it says its for 4-8 yr olds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this thing
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this thing. It was easy to assemble and it goes as you would expect. I do wish that the tires were rubber instead of hard plastic. It doesn't go through the grass very well, but it's good on hard surfaces. Overall, it's a good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A buyer of goods

customer_reviews.title: Almost great
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this purchase five stars yet the Teflon lock nut that holds the steering wheel on continuously backs off allowing the steering wheel to come off during use. I finally had to weld the lock nut to the plate inside of the steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way to small ordered this one bc it was suppose ...
customer_reviews.text: Way to small ordered this one bc it was suppose to be bigger my son is small and is six and it's to small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do they make one big enough for adults?
customer_reviews.text: Well-designed good product for the price. Big hit with the kids from 3 to 8 years old. No durability rating haven't had long enough but it's good quality so should be good.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Our three-year-old grandson loves it he has to get a little longer the legs were he can reach the pedals.
customer_reviews.author: gtw

customer_reviews.title: Amazing all the Grand kids love this item
customer_reviews.text: Amazing all the Grand kids love this item . Great pedal car for flat terrain. I can see how easily an older child using 3rd seat setting could easily pop a wheelie and flip on an upward hill. No helmet no ride is our rule any way. We are glad we purchased .
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Zeuschner

customer_reviews.title: Pedals continue to move while coasting!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent size. There are three hole adjustments for the seat. I brought this for my 4 year old and had to put the seat in the middle hole. Only complaint is that the pedals are close to the ground (tires could be at least 1 in taller to pick the cart up further away from the ground). Also when the cart is coasting, the pedals continue to move. So my daughter has to pick her feet up and rest them on the center frame to keep her feet from slipping off and have her ankles hit by the pedals.
customer_reviews.author: Hogg81

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Easy to assemble. My 6yr old son rides this thing for miles and he loves it; perfect birthday gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves this Go Kart
customer_reviews.text: He has a blast with this and rides it every time he visits. Good up to 110 pounds so he will get years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Regg Fred

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: My five year old loves it! It’s big enough for both he and my eight year old son to ride it down the hill in our backyard. Sturdy construction. I definitely recommend. It’s also a great substitute for kids who are having trouble learning to ride a bike.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Beeeeezos

customer_reviews.title: Follow 4-8 age recommendation.. my 4 yr old granddaughter was almost to small
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved getting this for xmas. Took about 15 minutes to assemble. Shes only 4 so it'll probably last a little while.
customer_reviews.author: john salyards

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT ISN’T AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as advertised. It’s way to small for the age and weight limit it claims to accommodate. Also in the description it says it has rubber wheels but that’s not what we got they are plastic. It would be and ok you for much younger kinda like maybe to age 5.
customer_reviews.author: Gerleen

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Husband put it together he said it came with no instructions and a washer was missing . We believe it fell out because it had little wholes in the box. But it is nice and my girls are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the 3 yr old and the 9 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Serious camper

product_meta.title: Hauck Lightning - Pedal Go Kart | Pedal Car | Ride On Toys For Boys & Girls With Ergonomic Adjustable Seat & Sharp Handling - Race Green
product_meta.description:
Color:Race GreenAlong with the innovative, durable features and sporty design, the Lightning gives an authentic driving experience and lets the driver control the pedal speed. The Lightning's quick response and sharp handling will excite young racers. The custom, ergonomic moulded seat is adjustable and equipped with a high backrest for a comfortable and safe sitting position.

Kids love the Lightning due to its very good handling characteristics, child-oriented ergonomics and great safety. In addition, it encourages physical activity, builds strength, endurance and co-ordination.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Along with the innovative, durable features and sporty design, the TRAXX Lightning gives an authentic driving experience and lets the driver control the pedal speed. The Lightning’s quick response and sharp handling will excite young racers. The custom, ergonomic moulded seat is adjustable and equipped with a high backrest – for a comfortable and safe sitting position. Speed can be kept in-check, even in curves, with the easy-to-use skid brake. Kids love the TRAXX Lightning due to its very good handling characteristics, child-oriented ergonomics and great safety. In addition, it encourages physical activity, builds strength, endurance and co-ordination.
feature_bullets: FUNCTION: This Pedal Go Kart provides an authentic driving experience and allows the driver to control their speed. Lightning is designed to be the perfect pedal go kart for young drivers and can be used to ride both indoor and outdoor. It encourages physical activity, builds strength, endurance and coordination.
PEDAL POWER: Always ready to go, never need to worry about batteries that require charging. Easy designed pedal-push sprocket, perfect for younger children.
DESIGN: Race-inspired pedals, rubber wheels and 8 ball style hand brake, 3-point sporty steering wheel and steel tube powder-coat frame.
COMFORT: The custom, ergonomic seat is adjustable and equipped with a high backrest for a comfortable, safe sitting position. This allows the child to be comfortable and ride longer.
PRODUCT DIMENSION: L: 38 inches | W: 21 inches | H: 22 inches | Weight: 21 lbs
